text:
Hii everyone :slightly_smiling_face:
I have one query .
one of my blog template is disapproved, and the issue is

 In your main style-sheet, please wrap the includes in single quotes vs. double quotes and resubmit once you've made this change.

but I have used double quotes in every template all are approved. why only this template is disapproved.. if any one knows the reason please let me know
